You should keep AutoKMS in start-up if you are running an illegal pirate copy of MS office 2010. 

If you were sold this copy of Office as genuine, you should immediately contact Microsoft as you have become a victim of software piracy!

YOUR ACTIVATION WILL NOT BE PERMENANT WITHOUT AUTOKMS.EXE!! DO NOT DELETE!

AUTOKMS = Auto Key Management Service
